headline: ComEd CEO Seeks Rules to Prevent AI From Boosting Energy Bills
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The head of Chicago’s biggest energy supplier has called for new rules to curb the impact of the artificial intelligence boom on consumers’ electricity bills.
